text: Had implant done by Dr Zawoo who is very skillful and efficient. And Dr TanBB as well.  Entire process/experience were very pleasant and assuring. Not forgetting the nurses (Cammie/Eileen/Daphne?) who are all so kind, friendly and helpful. Environment is spic and span too. Thank you Dr Zawoo, Dr TanBB and team for the hospitality. The dentists at Q&M Braddell are knowledgeable, patient, and transparent. The dentists provide clear explanations of procedures, treatment options, and pricing. During cleanings or treatments, the dentist checks in regularly to ensure comfort and is always willing to address questions or concerns. This makes a significant difference for patients who may have dental anxiety.

Q&M Braddell is a trustworthy dental clinic that offers quality care, professional service, and accessible treatment options for a wide range of dental needs. Whether it‚Äôs for regular cleanings or more advanced procedures, the outlet maintains a high standard. Highly recommended for those seeking reliable dental care in central Singapore.

Dr Shally and team (including her staff Cammy, Daphne) have been very professional, friendly and pleasant. I've been with Dr Shally for many years & she's always detailed , precise and sharing on the 'what, how , where' of your teeth condition - as opposed to ' polishing-&-go-home'. Great Dental & Advisory service from Q&M braddel branch.

Dr Eunice Foo and her team are always warm and assuring. Very detailed and always inform on what she is going to do next. The clinic is clean and I am always happy to return here for my dental checkups.

I always have a good dental experience with Dr Tan Bee Bee. She is very professional and skilled in her procedures. She would confirm the procedures that she will be doing for me and her gentle approach made me felt very comfortable each visit.
